analysis.description:
Reentrancy in NanoLoanEngine.pay (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#332-351):
	External calls:
	- transferValue = safeMult(toPay,getOracleRate(index)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#342-346)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,transferValue)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#346-347)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loans (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#347-349)
newTimestamp in NanoLoanEngine.internalAddInterest (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#288-289) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in NanoLoanEngine.pay (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#332-351):
	External calls:
	- transferValue = safeMult(toPay,getOracleRate(index)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#342-346)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,transferValue)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#346-347)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalLenderBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#349-350)

RpSafeMath.safeAdd (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#21-27) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)((z >= x) && (z >= y)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#23-25)

NanoLoanEngine.createLoan (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#120-140) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_expirationRequest > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#133-134)

NanoLoanEngine.lend (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#217-240) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= loan.expirationRequest) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#222-224)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,loan.borrower,safeMult(loan.amount,rate))) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#231-237)
	- loan.cosigner != address(0) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#237-240)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,loan.cosigner,safeMult(loan.cosignerFee,rate))) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#238-240)
	- loan.cancelableAt > 0 (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#228-231)
	- require(bool)(loan.status == Status.initial) (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#220-221)

NanoLoanEngine.internalAddInterest (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#278-321) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endNonPunitory > loan.interestTimestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#291-300)
	- timestamp > loan.interestTimestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#284-321)
	- timestamp > loan.dueTime (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#300-313)
	- newInterest != loan.interest || newPunitoryInterest != loan.punitoryInterest (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#313-321)

NanoLoanEngine.addInterestUpTo (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#322-329) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timestamp <= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol#326-329)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0xe403fd53eb2ab7735df442191f9a03dffa459e6f.sol:
